attributes.action: Follow diplomatic efforts and international law before military action in Syria
attributes.additional_details: There is no evidence, just propaganda. May is unelected, making decisions not in the best interests of the UK public. This has to stop.
attributes.background: We are jumping on board with the USA in striking Syria without concrete evidence, without consulting the UN / international community and without any diplomatic efforts beforehand. This would be considered an act of war by any other nation. Diplomacy first.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

If you would like the UK to "Take no military action in Syria using UK forces or weapons.", you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217290

If you believe "The Government must make Parliament Vote on Military Intervention in Syria", you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217264

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
